solution_line_template: Across Monday through Friday, the total number of hours Harry sleeps is {monday_sleep_hours} + {tuesday_sleep_hours} + {wednesday_sleep_hours} + {thursday_sleep_hours} + {friday_sleep_hours} = <<{monday_sleep_hours}+{tuesday_sleep_hours}+{wednesday_sleep_hours}+{thursday_sleep_hours}+{friday_sleep_hours}={total_sleep_hours}>>{total_sleep_hours} hours
The total number of days from Monday through Friday is <<{number_of_days}={number_of_days}>>{number_of_days} days
The average number of hours Harry sleeps in one night is {total_sleep_hours} / {number_of_days} = <<{total_sleep_hours}/{number_of_days}={average_sleep_hours}>>{average_sleep_hours} hours
